website_summaries.verdict: One shoe in the DVS Heritage Skate Shoes collection is the DVS Enduro Heir, a low-top that boasts a chunky old school façade and skate-ready features. Skating or not, it radiates a classic skate style that’s easy to wear any time of the day. Its overall performance gets high ratings from buyers. It has a full heel airbag for impact protection, heavily padded collar and tongue for added support and protection, and high abrasion rubber cupsole for superior durability. Aside from these, the Enduro Heir comes with an affordable price tag and multiple color options.
pros: The DVS Enduro Heir skate shoes are comfortable on foot according to most buyers
Several wearers commend the durability of this skate shoe from DVS Shoes
Some reviewers note that this shoe has excellent materials
Lots of purchasers report that like most DVS skate shoes, the Enduro Heir fits great
The budget-friendly price tag of this shoe pleases several shoppers
A few reviewers state that they love this shoe’s colors
The soles are long-lasting, per a couple of skaters
cons: Few disappointed reviewers state that the DVS Enduro Heir could use more cushioning on its insoles
Some wearers report that this shoe takes a while to break in
At least one reviewer mention that this shoe is heavy

customer_reviews.title: in memory
customer_reviews.text: Its a blast from the past. I love these big skate shoes. I hate the trend nowadays is these little vans type shoes. I have globe chet Thomas also. People who know recognize you probably are old school. Or your a Kyle. In that case they'll be plenty of big ugly DCs lying arlund the Nevada desert after the great 2019 area 51 massacre.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin perez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, reminds me of how they used to make skate shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ethan rupp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing feel even has a stash to use after breaking them in . came in the correct size everything i will refer this company in giving perfect service . thank you for the sticker also
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great but white shoes shouldn't come in a red box with red lettered paper wrapped around them there is one spec of red on cloth part of shoe would have gave 5 stars but cant for that reason
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe its comfy, fits great, and looks good. I dont know what else you would want out of a shoe
customer_reviews.author: Antnee

customer_reviews.title: Sik looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, although wish the tongue was a little bit flatter. It’s really really stuffed. Classic look
customer_reviews.author: ZipheR

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality material
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the bottom wasn't narrow. Need to be broken in but fit is a little tight
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in these and it's one of the most expensive shoes I've ever ordered
customer_reviews.author: TJ M.

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Right On DVS
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, I was browsing a got really lucky here!!! This shoe is so cool, he is saving as good shoes...lol DVS goes above and beyond with the quality of the interior foot bed also, they are not advertisedoing as orthotic but I believe they should. We have a pair that is about 5 years old...I slipped them on to do something outside and I thought my son had put a insole in them...no, original that held up after so long. I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Graybill

customer_reviews.title: Comfy McBigFoot
customer_reviews.text: super cool skate shoes! like a couch for your feet. shipping was quick and product was as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DVS!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Been buying dvs sense I was 15. 33 now an still the best skate shoes I’ve ever owned. Now that I don’t skate they last super long, last ones I bought I’ve had for 7 years n still look new other then the bottom is worn. Will never buy any other brand of shoes period. DVS it’s the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Schwabbles

product_meta.title: DVS Men's Enduro Heir Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: DVS is a global footwear brand dedicated to inspiring youth to have fun and always push forward. With a focus on originality, quality, and innovation, we create a diverse range of performance & lifestyle products designed for those who share our passion for defying boundaries. DVS Shoe Company was established in 1995 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
